title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench. The build option still appears in the Java popup menus.
EB: The "Build" action should be disabled in the popup menu if the build is already done automatically.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Open a Java file.
5. Right-click to open the context-sensitive popup menu.
6. The "Build" action should be disabled.
